subject: Order #SSN4744
description_text:
Hello, I had requested to cancel this purchase because I was in a difficult situation due to a personal problem at the time, but I have now managed to resolve it and wanted to ask if we could proceed with the order if possible. Since it hasn't been cancelled yet, could you please proceed with the order? I apologize.

Enviado do meu iPhone

conversations.body_text:
Hello, my pedals arrived today, and I remember I chose the pedals with the Hepatic pedals, but no Hepatic pedals arrived, only the pedals. Please resolve this situation. Enviado do meu iPhone

No dia 31/12/2025, às 11:36, service@simsonn.com escreveu:

﻿
Hi Andr? Nunes

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/9662?follow=email

Thank you for your patience.

View ticket<https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/9662?follow=email>
If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/9662?follow=email

Regards,
Support Center Support Team

9662:4206036

Hi Andr? Nunes,  I apologize for the delayed response.  Your order has been shipped in two separate packages. The other package that has not yet been received was shipped on the 14th.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:     https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047221881242
